verbs.description: It [V: is] [ARG2: exceedingly dangerous] [ARG1: for Trump to engage in talks with Kim] [ARGM-TMP: when the North Korean leader detects a gap in the relationship between America and South Korea] .
It is exceedingly dangerous for [ARG0: Trump] to [V: engage] [ARG2: in talks with Kim] when the North Korean leader detects a gap in the relationship between America and South Korea .
